ygData.subject: Re: Rogues/A ship approaches ...
ygData.msgSnippet: My plan involves playing the waiting game for now, Devilcat explains, but that doesn t mean we ll just sit on our hands ... Scanners indicate a battle on

"My plan involves playing the waiting game for now," Devilcat 
explains, "but that doesn't mean we'll just sit on our hands ..."

"Scanners indicate a battle on the southern continent!" Riekan 
interrupts.  His voice is raised slightly, but that is only to draw 
attention to the situation.  "The Predacons are at it again."

"Hmm, interesting ..." Devilcat considers for a moment.  "Keep an eye 
on things, I want to know the outcome.  In the meantime -"

This time the computer cuts him off: "Alert, spacecraft now exiting 
temporal wormhole.  Profile matches that of Vindicator."

Vindicator ... crewed by a group of vigilante heroes calling 
themselves the Forgotten Autobots, for months the Vindicator has 
dogged the Rogue Star persistently across space - and now time as 
well.  The mere mention of it is enough to curl a Rogue's lip.

Devilcat's reaction is immediate: "This time we're going to finish 
them off once and for all!  Noir, bring long-range weapons online and 
lock onto the Vindicator!"  Rogue Star boasts several batteries of 
missiles designed for bombardment of ground targets from orbit - but 
they work just as well going the other way.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Noir --
> 
> Noir nods, "I see..." She looks around the room, then back to the 
> incoming video feed. She wanted something to do.
> 
> "Devilcat... you have a plan? or are we going to just sit around for 
> a while..." Her impatience was more than just mild now, but that was 
> only because of her desire of distractions.
